'''1.5.1 Build 16''' is the sixteenth and final build for {{El|MinecraftEdu}} 1.5.1, released on July 12, 2013.<ref>{{link |url=http://services.minecraftedu.com/wiki/Changelog|title=MinecraftEdu Changelog|date=|website=|author=}}([https://web.archive.org/web/20170207182304/http://services.minecraftedu.com/wiki/Changelog Archive])</ref> It is based on [[Java Edition 1.5.1]].

== Additions ==
* Students can now use the build tools keybindings.
* Moved open current map folder button from setting to world information in server GUI.

== Fixes ==
* Fixed TNT ignition with fire arrows when TNT was disabled.
* Pistons can't push blocks over border blocks or build disallow blocks.
